00047 CSndBuffer::CSndBuffer(const int& size, const int& mss):
00048 m_BufLock(),
00049 m_pBlock(NULL),
00050 m_pFirstBlock(NULL),
00051 m_pCurrBlock(NULL),
00052 m_pLastBlock(NULL),
00053 m_pBuffer(NULL),
00054 m_iNextMsgNo(1),
00055 m_iSize(size),
00056 m_iMSS(mss),
00057 m_iCount(0)
00058 {
00059    // initial physical buffer of "size"
00060    m_pBuffer = new Buffer;
00061    m_pBuffer->m_pcData = new char [m_iSize * m_iMSS];
00062    m_pBuffer->m_iSize = m_iSize;
00063    m_pBuffer->m_pNext = NULL;
00064 
00065    // circular linked list for out bound packets
00066    m_pBlock = new Block;
00067    Block* pb = m_pBlock;
00068    for (int i = 1; i < m_iSize; ++ i)
00069    {
00070       pb->m_pNext = new Block;
00071       pb->m_iMsgNo = 0;
00072       pb = pb->m_pNext;
00073    }
00074    pb->m_pNext = m_pBlock;
00075 
00076    pb = m_pBlock;
00077    char* pc = m_pBuffer->m_pcData;
00078    for (int i = 0; i < m_iSize; ++ i)
00079    {
00080       pb->m_pcData = pc;
00081       pb = pb->m_pNext;
00082       pc += m_iMSS;
00083    }
00084 
00085    m_pFirstBlock = m_pCurrBlock = m_pLastBlock = m_pBlock;
00086 
00087    #ifndef WIN32
00088       pthread_mutex_init(&m_BufLock, NULL);
00089    #else
00090       m_BufLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00091    #endif
00092 }
00093 
00094 CSndBuffer::~CSndBuffer()
00095 {
00096    Block* pb = m_pBlock->m_pNext;
00097    while (pb != m_pBlock)
00098    {
00099       Block* temp = pb;
00100       pb = pb->m_pNext;
00101       delete temp;
00102    }
00103    delete m_pBlock;
00104 
00105    while (m_pBuffer != NULL)
00106    {
00107       Buffer* temp = m_pBuffer;
00108       m_pBuffer = m_pBuffer->m_pNext;
00109       delete [] temp->m_pcData;
00110       delete temp;
00111    }
00112 
00113    #ifndef WIN32
00114       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_BufLock);
00115    #else
00116       CloseHandle(m_BufLock);
00117    #endif
00118 }
00119 
00120 void CSndBuffer::addBuffer(const char* data, const int& len, const int& ttl, const bool& order)
00121 {
00122    int size = len / m_iMSS;
00123    if ((len % m_iMSS) != 0)
00124       size ++;
00125 
00126    // dynamically increase sender buffer
00127    while (size + m_iCount >= m_iSize)
00128       increase();
00129 
00130    uint64_t time = CTimer::getTime();
00131    int32_t inorder = order;
00132    inorder <<= 29;
00133 
00134    Block* s = m_pLastBlock;
00135    for (int i = 0; i < size; ++ i)
00136    {
00137       int pktlen = len - i * m_iMSS;
00138       if (pktlen > m_iMSS)
00139          pktlen = m_iMSS;
00140 
00141       memcpy(s->m_pcData, data + i * m_iMSS, pktlen);
00142       s->m_iLength = pktlen;
00143 
00144       s->m_iMsgNo = m_iNextMsgNo | inorder;
00145       if (i == 0)
00146          s->m_iMsgNo |= 0x80000000;
00147       if (i == size - 1)
00148          s->m_iMsgNo |= 0x40000000;
00149 
00150       s->m_OriginTime = time;
00151       s->m_iTTL = ttl;
00152 
00153       s = s->m_pNext;
00154    }
00155    m_pLastBlock = s;
00156 
00157    CGuard::enterCS(m_BufLock);
00158    m_iCount += size;
00159    CGuard::leaveCS(m_BufLock);
00160 
00161    m_iNextMsgNo ++;
00162    if (m_iNextMsgNo == CMsgNo::m_iMaxMsgNo)
00163       m_iNextMsgNo = 1;
00164 }
00165 
00166 int CSndBuffer::addBufferFromFile(fstream& ifs, const int& len)
00167 {
00168    int size = len / m_iMSS;
00169    if ((len % m_iMSS) != 0)
00170       size ++;
00171 
00172    // dynamically increase sender buffer
00173    while (size + m_iCount >= m_iSize)
00174       increase();
00175 
00176    Block* s = m_pLastBlock;
00177    int total = 0;
00178    for (int i = 0; i < size; ++ i)
00179    {
00180       if (ifs.bad() || ifs.fail() || ifs.eof())
00181          break;
00182 
00183       int pktlen = len - i * m_iMSS;
00184       if (pktlen > m_iMSS)
00185          pktlen = m_iMSS;
00186 
00187       ifs.read(s->m_pcData, pktlen);
00188       if ((pktlen = ifs.gcount()) <= 0)
00189          break;
00190 
00191       s->m_iLength = pktlen;
00192       s->m_iTTL = -1;
00193       s = s->m_pNext;
00194 
00195       total += pktlen;
00196    }
00197 
00198    CGuard::enterCS(m_BufLock);
00199    m_pLastBlock = s;
00200    m_iCount += size;
00201    CGuard::leaveCS(m_BufLock);
00202 
00203    return total;
00204 }
00205 
00206 int CSndBuffer::readData(char** data, int32_t& msgno)
00207 {
00208    // No data to read
00209    if (m_pCurrBlock == m_pLastBlock)
00210       return 0;
00211 
00212    *data = m_pCurrBlock->m_pcData;
00213    int readlen = m_pCurrBlock->m_iLength;
00214    msgno = m_pCurrBlock->m_iMsgNo;
00215 
00216    m_pCurrBlock = m_pCurrBlock->m_pNext;
00217 
00218    return readlen;
00219 }
00220 
00221 int CSndBuffer::readData(char** data, const int offset, int32_t& msgno, int& msglen)
00222 {
00223    CGuard bufferguard(m_BufLock);
00224 
00225    Block* p = m_pFirstBlock;
00226 
00227    for (int i = 0; i < offset; ++ i)
00228       p = p->m_pNext;
00229 
00230    if ((p->m_iTTL >= 0) && ((CTimer::getTime() - p->m_OriginTime) / 1000 > (uint64_t)p->m_iTTL))
00231    {
00232       msgno = p->m_iMsgNo & 0x1FFFFFFF;
00233 
00234       msglen = 1;
00235       p = p->m_pNext;
00236       bool move = false;
00237       while (msgno == (p->m_iMsgNo & 0x1FFFFFFF))
00238       {
00239          if (p == m_pCurrBlock)
00240             move = true;
00241          p = p->m_pNext;
00242          if (move)
00243             m_pCurrBlock = p;
00244          msglen ++;
00245       }
00246 
00247       return -1;
00248    }
00249 
00250    *data = p->m_pcData;
00251    int readlen = p->m_iLength;
00252    msgno = p->m_iMsgNo;
00253 
00254    return readlen;
00255 }
00256 
00257 void CSndBuffer::ackData(const int& offset)
00258 {
00259    CGuard bufferguard(m_BufLock);
00260 
00261    for (int i = 0; i < offset; ++ i)
00262       m_pFirstBlock = m_pFirstBlock->m_pNext;
00263 
00264    m_iCount -= offset;
00265 
00266    CTimer::triggerEvent();
00267 }
00268 
00269 int CSndBuffer::getCurrBufSize() const
00270 {
00271    return m_iCount;
00272 }
00273 
00274 void CSndBuffer::increase()
00275 {
00276    int unitsize = m_pBuffer->m_iSize;
00277 
00278    // new physical buffer
00279    Buffer* nbuf = NULL;
00280    try
00281    {
00282       nbuf  = new Buffer;
00283       nbuf->m_pcData = new char [unitsize * m_iMSS];
00284    }
00285    catch (...)
00286    {
00287       delete nbuf;
00288       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00289    }
00290    nbuf->m_iSize = unitsize;
00291    nbuf->m_pNext = NULL;
00292 
00293    // insert the buffer at the end of the buffer list
00294    Buffer* p = m_pBuffer;
00295    while (NULL != p->m_pNext)
00296       p = p->m_pNext;
00297    p->m_pNext = nbuf;
00298 
00299    // new packet blocks
00300    Block* nblk = NULL;
00301    try
00302    {
00303       nblk = new Block;
00304    }
00305    catch (...)
00306    {
00307       delete nblk;
00308       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00309    }
00310    Block* pb = nblk;
00311    for (int i = 1; i < unitsize; ++ i)
00312    {
00313       pb->m_pNext = new Block;
00314       pb = pb->m_pNext;
00315    }
00316 
00317    // insert the new blocks onto the existing one
00318    pb->m_pNext = m_pLastBlock->m_pNext;
00319    m_pLastBlock->m_pNext = nblk;
00320 
00321    pb = nblk;
00322    char* pc = nbuf->m_pcData;
00323    for (int i = 0; i < unitsize; ++ i)
00324    {
00325       pb->m_pcData = pc;
00326       pb = pb->m_pNext;
00327       pc += m_iMSS;
00328    }
00329 
00330    m_iSize += unitsize;
00331 }

00335 CRcvBuffer::CRcvBuffer(CUnitQueue* queue):
00336 m_pUnit(NULL),
00337 m_iSize(65536),
00338 m_pUnitQueue(queue),
00339 m_iStartPos(0),
00340 m_iLastAckPos(0),
00341 m_iMaxPos(-1),
00342 m_iNotch(0)
00343 {
00344    m_pUnit = new CUnit* [m_iSize];
00345 }
00346 
00347 CRcvBuffer::CRcvBuffer(const int& bufsize, CUnitQueue* queue):
00348 m_pUnit(NULL),
00349 m_iSize(bufsize),
00350 m_pUnitQueue(queue),
00351 m_iStartPos(0),
00352 m_iLastAckPos(0),
00353 m_iMaxPos(-1),
00354 m_iNotch(0)
00355 {
00356    m_pUnit = new CUnit* [m_iSize];
00357    for (int i = 0; i < m_iSize; ++ i)
00358       m_pUnit[i] = NULL;
00359 }
00360 
00361 CRcvBuffer::~CRcvBuffer()
00362 {
00363    for (int i = 0; i < m_iSize; ++ i)
00364    {
00365       if (NULL != m_pUnit[i])
00366       {
00367          m_pUnit[i]->m_iFlag = 0;
00368          -- m_pUnitQueue->m_iCount;
00369       }
00370    }
00371 
00372    delete [] m_pUnit;
00373 }
00374 
00375 int CRcvBuffer::addData(CUnit* unit, int offset)
00376 {
00377    int pos = (m_iLastAckPos + offset) % m_iSize;
00378    if (offset > m_iMaxPos)
00379       m_iMaxPos = offset;
00380 
00381    if (NULL != m_pUnit[pos])
00382       return -1;
00383    
00384    m_pUnit[pos] = unit;
00385 
00386    unit->m_iFlag = 1;
00387    ++ m_pUnitQueue->m_iCount;
00388 
00389    return 0;
00390 }
00391 
00392 int CRcvBuffer::readBuffer(char* data, const int& len)
00393 {
00394    int p = m_iStartPos;
00395    int lastack = m_iLastAckPos;
00396    int rs = len;
00397 
00398    while ((p != lastack) && (rs > 0))
00399    {
00400       int unitsize = m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.getLength() - m_iNotch;
00401       if (unitsize > rs)
00402          unitsize = rs;
00403 
00404       memcpy(data, m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.m_pcData + m_iNotch, unitsize);
00405       data += unitsize;
00406 
00407       if ((rs > unitsize) || (rs == m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.getLength() - m_iNotch))
00408       {
00409          CUnit* tmp = m_pUnit[p];
00410          m_pUnit[p] = NULL;
00411          tmp->m_iFlag = 0;
00412          -- m_pUnitQueue->m_iCount;
00413 
00414          if (++ p == m_iSize)
00415             p = 0;
00416 
00417          m_iNotch = 0;
00418       }
00419       else
00420          m_iNotch += rs;
00421 
00422       rs -= unitsize;
00423    }
00424 
00425    m_iStartPos = p;
00426    return len - rs;
00427 }
00428 
00429 int CRcvBuffer::readBufferToFile(fstream& ofs, const int& len)
00430 {
00431    int p = m_iStartPos;
00432    int lastack = m_iLastAckPos;
00433    int rs = len;
00434 
00435    while ((p != lastack) && (rs > 0))
00436    {
00437       int unitsize = m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.getLength() - m_iNotch;
00438       if (unitsize > rs)
00439          unitsize = rs;
00440 
00441       ofs.write(m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.m_pcData + m_iNotch, unitsize);
00442       if (ofs.fail())
00443          break;
00444 
00445       if ((rs > unitsize) || (rs == m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.getLength() - m_iNotch))
00446       {
00447          CUnit* tmp = m_pUnit[p];
00448          m_pUnit[p] = NULL;
00449          tmp->m_iFlag = 0;
00450          -- m_pUnitQueue->m_iCount;
00451 
00452          if (++ p == m_iSize)
00453             p = 0;
00454 
00455          m_iNotch = 0;
00456       }
00457       else
00458          m_iNotch += rs;
00459 
00460       rs -= unitsize;
00461    }
00462 
00463    m_iStartPos = p;
00464 
00465    return len - rs;
00466 }
00467 
00468 void CRcvBuffer::ackData(const int& len)
00469 {
00470    m_iLastAckPos = (m_iLastAckPos + len) % m_iSize;
00471    m_iMaxPos -= len;
00472    if (m_iMaxPos < 0)
00473       m_iMaxPos = 0;
00474 
00475    CTimer::triggerEvent();
00476 }

00478 int CRcvBuffer::getAvailBufSize() const
00479 {
00480    // One slot must be empty in order to tell the difference between "empty buffer" and "full buffer"
00481    return m_iSize - getRcvDataSize() - 1;
00482 }
00483 
00484 int CRcvBuffer::getRcvDataSize() const
00485 {
00486    if (m_iLastAckPos >= m_iStartPos)
00487       return m_iLastAckPos - m_iStartPos;
00488 
00489    return m_iSize + m_iLastAckPos - m_iStartPos;
00490 }
00491 
00492 void CRcvBuffer::dropMsg(const int32_t& msgno)
00493 {
00494    for (int i = m_iStartPos, n = (m_iLastAckPos + m_iMaxPos) % m_iSize; i != n; i = (i + 1) % m_iSize)
00495       if ((NULL != m_pUnit[i]) && (msgno == m_pUnit[i]->m_Packet.m_iMsgNo))
00496          m_pUnit[i]->m_iFlag = 3;
00497 }
00498 
00499 int CRcvBuffer::readMsg(char* data, const int& len)
00500 {
00501    int p, q;
00502    bool passack;
00503    if (!scanMsg(p, q, passack))
00504       return 0;
00505 
00506    int rs = len;
00507    while (p != (q + 1) % m_iSize)
00508    {
00509       int unitsize = m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.getLength();
00510       if ((rs >= 0) && (unitsize > rs))
00511          unitsize = rs;
00512 
00513       if (unitsize > 0)
00514       {
00515          memcpy(data, m_pUnit[p]->m_Packet.m_pcData, unitsize);
00516          data += unitsize;
00517          rs -= unitsize;
00518       }
00519 
00520       if (!passack)
00521       {
00522          CUnit* tmp = m_pUnit[p];
00523          m_pUnit[p] = NULL;
00524          tmp->m_iFlag = 0;
00525          -- m_pUnitQueue->m_iCount;
00526       }
00527       else
00528          m_pUnit[p]->m_iFlag = 2;
00529 
00530       if (++ p == m_iSize)
00531          p = 0;
00532    }
00533 
00534    if (!passack)
00535       m_iStartPos = (q + 1) % m_iSize;
00536 
00537    return len - rs;
00538 }
00539 
00540 int CRcvBuffer::getRcvMsgNum()
00541 {
00542    int p, q;
00543    bool passack;
00544    return scanMsg(p, q, passack) ? 1 : 0;
00545 }
00546 
00547 bool CRcvBuffer::scanMsg(int& p, int& q, bool& passack)
00548 {
00549    // empty buffer
00550    if ((m_iStartPos == m_iLastAckPos) && (m_iMaxPos <= 0))
00551       return false;
00552 
00553    //skip all bad msgs at the beginning
00554    while (m_iStartPos != m_iLastAckPos)
00555    {
00556       if (NULL == m_pUnit[m_iStartPos])
00557       {
00558          if (++ m_iStartPos == m_iSize)
00559             m_iStartPos = 0;
00560          continue;
00561       }
00562 
00563       if ((1 == m_pUnit[m_iStartPos]->m_iFlag) && (m_pUnit[m_iStartPos]->m_Packet.getMsgBoundary() > 1))
00564       {
00565          bool good = true;
00566 
00567          // look ahead for the whole message
00568          for (int i = m_iStartPos; i != m_iLastAckPos;)
00569          {
00570             if ((NULL == m_pUnit[i]) || (1 != m_pUnit[i]->m_iFlag))
00571             {
00572                good = false;
00573                break;
00574             }
00575 
00576             if ((m_pUnit[i]->m_Packet.getMsgBoundary() == 1) || (m_pUnit[i]->m_Packet.getMsgBoundary() == 3))
00577                break;
00578 
00579             if (++ i == m_iSize)
00580                i = 0;
00581          }
00582 
00583          if (good)
00584             break;
00585       }
00586 
00587       CUnit* tmp = m_pUnit[m_iStartPos];
00588       m_pUnit[m_iStartPos] = NULL;
00589       tmp->m_iFlag = 0;
00590       -- m_pUnitQueue->m_iCount;
00591 
00592       if (++ m_iStartPos == m_iSize)
00593          m_iStartPos = 0;
00594    }
00595 
00596    p = -1;                  // message head
00597    q = m_iStartPos;         // message tail
00598    passack = m_iStartPos == m_iLastAckPos;
00599    bool found = false;
00600 
00601    // looking for the first message
00602    for (int i = 0, n = m_iMaxPos + getRcvDataSize(); i <= n; ++ i)
00603    {
00604       if ((NULL != m_pUnit[q]) && (1 == m_pUnit[q]->m_iFlag))
00605       {
00606          switch (m_pUnit[q]->m_Packet.getMsgBoundary())
00607          {
00608          case 3: // 11
00609             p = q;
00610             found = true;
00611             break;
00612 
00613          case 2: // 10
00614             p = q;
00615             break;
00616 
00617          case 1: // 01
00618             if (p != -1)
00619                found = true;
00620          }
00621       }
00622       else
00623       {
00624          // a hole in this message, not valid, restart search
00625          p = -1;
00626       }
00627 
00628       if (found)
00629       {
00630          // the msg has to be ack'ed or it is allowed to read out of order, and was not read before
00631          if (!passack || !m_pUnit[q]->m_Packet.getMsgOrderFlag())
00632             break;
00633 
00634          found = false;
00635       }
00636 
00637       if (++ q == m_iSize)
00638          q = 0;
00639 
00640       if (q == m_iLastAckPos)
00641          passack = true;
00642    }
00643 
00644    // no msg found
00645    if (!found)
00646    {
00647       // if the message is larger than the receiver buffer, return part of the message
00648       if ((p != -1) && ((q + 1) % m_iSize == p))
00649          found = true;
00650    }
00651 
00652    return found;
00653 }
